entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts. He is described as having twinkling eyes and thick silver eyebrows.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts. He is described as feeling nervous and grinning awkwardly.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is Dumbledore's phoenix. It has the ability to call out to its master.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle is a person of interest in the story. He is described as being interested in Harry.

relationships.description: Dumbledore thanks Harry for showing him loyalty down in the Chamber.
Tom Riddle compares Harry to himself.
